name: Fluffy
bio: Hi, I'm Fluffy! I love chasing my tail and barking at the mailman. My favorite pastime is napping on the couch.

name: Whiskers
bio: Hello, I'm Whiskers. I enjoy long naps in the sun and knocking things off the counter. I'm a master of the purr and the silent meow.

name: Bubbles
bio: Hey there, I'm Bubbles! I swim around all day and blow bubbles. I might be small, but I have a big personality.

name: Spike
bio: Hi, I'm Spike. I may look prickly, but I'm a softie at heart. I love exploring and curling up into a ball.

name: Chirpy
bio: Hello, I'm Chirpy! I love singing and hopping around. My favorite thing is to wake everyone up with my cheerful tweets.

name: Nibbles
bio: Hi, I'm Nibbles. I love running on my wheel and nibbling on treats. I'm always up for an adventure in my little world.

name: Rex
bio: Roar! I'm Rex, the tiny dinosaur. I might be small, but I have a big roar. I love stomping around and pretending I'm a giant.

name: Shadow
bio: Hello, I'm Shadow. I'm mysterious and love hiding in the shadows. I enjoy quiet moments and observing everything around me.
